<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_cls_idea">
    <x_snc_cls_idea action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>false</active>
        <description>Create custom actions to add/remove users in a group from a catalog item request</description>
        <episode display_value="NOWCommunity Live Stream - 2019-06-17">82a8fe12db8ebb40f6d0a422ca9619d7</episode>
        <name>Custom action to manage users/groups in Flow Designer</name>
        <script><![CDATA[(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
  var memberGr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
  memberGr.newRecord();
  memberGr.user = inputs.user.sys_id;
  memberGr.group = inputs.group.sys_id;
  var id = memberGr.insert();
  outputs.id = id;
})(inputs, outputs);
]]></script>
